scripts.flowgenWindows: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const { readdirSync, statSync, mkdirSync } = require('fs'); const { join, dirname } = require('path'); function walk(dir) { const results = []; for (const file of readdirSync(dir)) { const full = join(dir, file); if (statSync(full).isDirectory()) results.push(...walk(full)); else if (full.endsWith('.d.ts')) results.push(full); } return results; } walk('dist').forEach(file => { const out = join('flow-types', file.replace(/^dist[\/]/, '').replace(/\.d\.ts$/, '.js.flow')); mkdirSync(dirname(out), { recursive: true }); try { execSync(`npx flowgen "${file}" -o "${out}"`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e) { console.warn(`⚠️ Failed to generate Flow types for: ${file}`); } });"
